title: Chin Tedim - John (Print)
description: Chin Tedim translation of the Gospel of John. The Tedim or Zomi language is spoken mostly in Burma and India. In Chin State, it is spoken in Tedim and Tonzang townships, while in Sagaing Division, it is spoken in Kalay and Mawlaik townships. Dialects are Sokte and Kamhau.

language.name: Tedim Chin
language.area: Chin Hills state, Upper Chindwin, Tiddim area. Also in India.
